title: T206 Ty Cobb Now on Ebay

posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb Now on Ebay
posts.post_content:
Prices are check/money order,  or paypal gift to get immediate shipping.  Will ship first class with insurance.  

Prefer email over PM's,  [url]cardstokeep@aol.com[/url]
